recommendation: The campaign shows strong performance on several stations and dayparts, but ON and LF are underperforming significantly. Reallocating budget from underperforming areas to high-efficiency stations and dayparts could improve overall ROAS.
Increase spots on LIFE by 20%, aiming for 16 additional spots.

business_rationale: LIFE has a high efficiency (45.5 visits/spot) and a relatively low cost per visit, indicating strong potential for scaling.
